info.name: Vaporeon's CSS
info.additionalInfo:
credits to Lain and 4age

v1.1 - fixed chat highlight color
v1.2 - more color fixes after updates
v1.3 - more color fixes after updates
v1.4 - brightened filename text, fixed background for uploading files
v1.5 - damnit Lain stop changing the colors
v1.6 - more fixes
v1.7 - everything fixed (scrolling still broken, deal with it)
v1.8 - updated: mercwmouth and anon007 filtered in chat (text color=background), made myself dark blue, top 3 uploaders dark gold
v1.9 - filter_reminder changed
v1.91 - uploading arrow changed to blue (#7284cf), also filtered apha
v1.92 - fixed some issues, also filtered marky

v2.0.0! - cleaned up Lain's shit, fixed scrolling, and whatever else was broken/needed tweaking. Only issue now is the dropdown list doesn't work, but it's useless anyway.
v2.0.1 - okay, i missed a few things; fixed
v2.0.2 - ... fixes
v2.1 - fixes
v2.2 - fixes, added some borders
v2.3 - darkened chat highlight left border box, commented out chat filters
v2.4 - couple small changes, themed the new music player
v2.4.1 - commented out the filters, new screenshot
v2.5 - updates/changes/fixes
v2.6 - fixes
v2.7 - updated
